title: Employee Inquiry About a Policy
description: An employee calls the HR help desk to ask about the company's tuition reimbursement policy.

tasks.description: Search the internal knowledge base for the 'Tuition Reimbursement Policy'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the official policy document.

tasks.description: Explain the key aspects of the policy (e.g., eligibility, maximum reimbursement amount, grade requirements) to the employee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly and accurately answers the employee's questions.
